page.title: 08LEISURE IN SUTTON COLDFIELD
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR FORM OF ENTERTAINMENT IN THE 1980'S IS TELEVISION. INDEPENDENT, COMMERCIAL OR STATE-OWNED STATIONS CATER FOR ALL AGES. VIDEOS ARE BECOMING INCREASINGLY POPULAR AND FILMS ARE AVAILABLE ON CASSETTES FOR HIRE OR PURCHASE SO THEY CAN BE VIEWED AT LEISURE IN THE HOME. FITNESS IS BECOMING MORE IMPORTANT ESPECIALLY TO ADULTS. MARATHON RUNNING AND AEROBICS ARE PARTICULARLY POPULAR. IN SUTTON THERE IS AN ANNUAL 10 MILE FUN RUN, WHICH IS RUN BY THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE FOR CHARITY. NIGHTCLUBS YOUTH CLUBS AND DISCOS ARE ESPECIALLY POPULAR WITH THE 14-18 AGE BRACKET. I GO TO A WEEKLY DISCO AT A LOCAL YOUTH CLUB IN STREETLY AND A LARGE DISCO NAMED{"BLAISES"}HELD ONCE A MONTH AT SUTTON TOWN HALL. ADULTS PREFER TO RELAX BY SMOKING AND DRINKING.{
